body.p: includes an Administration Page where you can configure various options.

section.title: Signing in to the Administration Page

ol.li: Use the IP address shown in the VM console to access the web interface of . The address should be https://<server-address>:9080.By default, uses a self-signed certificate. If you did not change it, the browser will display a security warning. Continue (for example, if you are using Edge or Internet Explorer, click Details and then Go on to the webpage).
Login with the credentials you configured in the initial setup.

section.title: General Tab
section.p: This tab contains the following options:

dlentry.dd: Displays the IP address or DNS name of your server and you can change it.

Select this option if you want to enable HTTPS protocol for your users. When you select this checkbox, it will expand and provide options to upload your certificate and private key. The information in the displayed TLS certificate table will be updated according to the uploaded certificate.

section.p: Click Save to apply your changes and then restart the browser.

section.title: License Tab
section.p: If you have already activated your license, this tab simply contains a Manage License button. Clicking this button opens a license management and statistics page. If you don't already have a license, you can request a Trial license.

section.title: Mail Tab
section.p: This tab contains the following options:

dlentry.dd: Select this option is you want to configure to use your mail server. When you select this checkbox, it will expand and provide options to configure the details of your mail server.

If you want to use the built-in email server, you may want to configure a DKIM private key. In this case, paste the private key in this text field.When generating the DKIM private key, the selector must be set to mail.

dlentry.dt: Disable e-mail address validation on sign-up
dlentry.dd: If you select this option, when users sign up, their accounts will be activated without email confirmation.

section.p: Click Save to apply your changes.

section.title: Authentication Tab
section.p: This tab contains the following option:

dlentry.dd: Select this option is you want to use your own LDAP configuration instead of the built-in authentication. When you select this checkbox, it will expand and provide options to configure the details of your LDAP authentication.If your LDAP server uses a self-signed SSL certificate, select the Use SSL option and choose your certificate.

section.p: Click Save to apply your changes.

section.title: Web Author Tab
section.p: This tab simply contains a Manage Web Author button. Clicking this button opens the Administration Page. This page provides options for configuring the visual editor that is used in . For example, you can upload your own custom frameworks using this page.
